IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: WAYLAND ACADEMY PREPARES EACH STUDENT FOR COLLEGE AND BEYOND THROUGH A LIBERAL ARTS CURRICULUM AND CAMPUS PROGRAMS DEVOTED TO THE PURSUIT OF KNOWLEDGE AND THE DEVELOPMENT OF CHARACTER.
IRS990.MissionDesc: WAYLAND ACADEMY PREPARES EACH STUDENT FOR COLLEGE AND BEYOND THROUGH A LIBERAL ARTS CURRICULUM AND CAMPUS PROGRAMS DEVOTED TO THE PURSUIT OF KNOWLEDGE AND THE DEVELOPMENT OF CHARACTER.
IRS990.Desc: WAYLAND ACADEMY IS A COEDUCATIONAL COLLEGE PREPARATORY BOARDING AND DAY SCHOOL FOR STUDENTS IN GRADES 9-12. AT WAYLAND ACADEMY, WE PREPARE EACH STUDENT FOR COLLEGE AND BEYOND THROUGH A LIBERAL ARTS CURRICULUM AND CAMPUS PROGRAMS DEVOTED TO THE PURSUIT OF KNOWLEDGE AND THE DEVELOPMENT OF CHARACTER. FOR THE 2015-16 ACADEMIC YEAR, 190 STUDENTS REPRESENTING 32 COUNTRIES AND 10 STATES WERE ENROLLED AT WAYLAND ACADEMY.

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN ASSETS HELD IN TRUST
CASH SURRENDER VALUE OF LIFE INSURANCE POLICIES
BENEFICIAL INTERESTS IN CHARITABLE REMAINDER TRUSTS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COLLECTION ITEMS ACQUIRED BY CONTRIBUTION SINCE 1997 ARE NOT RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE COLLECTION ITEM IS A WORK OF ART THAT IS HELD FOR PUBLIC EXHIBITION IN THE COURTYARD OF THE CAMPUS. THE ITEM WAS RECEIVED IN OCTOBER 2007 AND HAD AN APPRAISED VALUE OF APPROXIMATELY $31,000 AT THE TIME OF DONATION. THIS COLLECTION ITEM IS NOT SUBJECT TO ANY RESTRICTIONS BY THE DONOR.

THE ACADEMY'S COLLECTION ITEM IS A WORK OF ART THAT IS HELD FOR PUBLIC EXHIBITION IN THE COURTYARD OF THE CAMPUS. THE WORK OF ART BEAUTIFIES THE CAMPUS FOR STUDENTS, PARENTS, PROSPECTIVE STUDENTS, AND OTHER VISITORS.
THE ORGANIZATION'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE PRIMARILY USED TO PROVIDE FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO STUDENTS ATTENDING WAYLAND ACADEMY.

CHANGE IN VALUE OF PERPETUAL TRUST -31,055. INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT FEES REPORTED ON FORM 990, PART IX, LINE 11F -41,894. CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN TRUST 70,794. CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN CHARITABLE REMAINDER TRUSTS -9,868. CHANGE IN VALUE OF SPLIT-INTEREST AGREEMENT 5,822.

COST OF GOODS SOLD REPORTED ON FORM 990, PART VIII, LINE 10B 20,585. SPECIAL EVENT EXPENSES INCLUDED ON FORM 990, PART IX, LINE 8B 28,263.
THE ACADEMY'S RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY IS INCLUDED IN ALL ADVERTISING PUBLISHED IN NEWSPAPERS OF GENERAL CIRCULATION.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.RelationshipDescriptionTxt: ENTITY OWNED BY JOHN MCKINSTRY, TRUSTEE

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION IS REPORTING THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS IN COLUMN (B).

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ACADEMY DOCUMENTS ALL MEETINGS HELD AND ACTIONS UNDERTAKEN BY THE GOVERNING BODY. MINUTES OF MEETINGS HELD BY COMMITTEES WITH AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE GOVERNING BODY ARE GENERALLY NOT TAKEN. MEMBERS OF THESE COMMITTEES ARE GENERALLY ALSO MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY AND ACTIONS UNDERTAKEN BY THESE COMMITTEES ARE REPORTED TO THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PREPARED FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY, THE HEAD OF SCHOOL, AND THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER BEFORE THE RETURN IS FILED WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL TRUSTEES AND OFFICERS ARE REQUIRED TO VERBALLY DISCLOSE ALL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST AT EACH QUARTERLY MEETING AND ARE ANNUALLY REQUIRED TO SIGN CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE STATEMENTS. IF A CONFLICT ARISES, THAT TRUSTEE RECUSES HIM/HERSELF FROM VOTING ON THE MATTER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CHAIRPERSON MEETS WITH THE ACADEMY'S HEAD OF SCHOOL ANNUALLY TO DISCUSS HIS PERFORMANCE EVALUATION AND COMPENSATION PACKAGE. COMPARABILITY DATA IS OBTAINED BUT IS NOT SOLELY UTILIZED IN DETERMINING THE COMPENSATION PACKAGE. THE FINANCIAL ABILITY OF THE ACADEMY TO PAY APPROPRIATE COMPENSATION IS A MAJOR FACTOR IN DETERMINING THE COMPENSATION PACKAGE. A WRITTEN CONTRACT IS SIGNED BY THE CHAIRPERSON AND THE HEAD OF SCHOOL. OTHER OFFICERS ARE ANNUALLY EVALUATED BY THE HEAD OF SCHOOL. COMPARABILITY DATA IS OBTAINED BUT IS NOT SOLELY UTILIZED FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION PACKAGES. THE FINANCIAL ABILITY OF THE ACADEMY TO PAY APPROPRIATE COMPENSATION IS A MAJOR FACTOR IN DETERMINING THE COMPENSATION PACKAGE. A WRITTEN ONE-YEAR CONTRACT IS SIGNED BY THE OFFICER AND THE HEAD OF SCHOOL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ACADEMY MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST ON A CASE-BY-CASE BASIS.
